thread.title: 'The Martian' Tops Weekend Box Office With $55 Million Debut!
thread.title_full: 'The Martian' Tops Weekend Box Office With $55 Million Debut! - newsR

author: newsr.in
title: 'The Martian' Tops Weekend Box Office With $55 Million Debut!
text: Matt Damon ‘s new flick The Martian opened huge with $55 million, making it this weekend’s top film! According to THR, the 3D space movie, also starring Kate Mara, Jessica Chastain, and Chiwetel Ejiofor, almost beat Gravity in nabbing the top October opening of all time. Coming in at No. 2 was the animated flick Hotel [...] »
